alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Lee; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:55PM EDT until August 15 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lee County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... Southern Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 455 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Elgin, or 9 miles east of Columbia, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Sumter, Camden, Bishopville, Shaw Air Base, Lugoff, Oakland, Elliott, Elgin, Lee State Park, Sumter County Airport, Goodale State Park, Lucknow, Dalzell, Dinkins Mill, Manville, Spring Hill, Boykin, Wateree River Correctional Institution, and Stateburg. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 82 and 121. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
